Intro
-----


Faceted bar charts allow you to combine many charts into one and save the space of replicating the axis.


![faceted_bar.png](faceted_bar.png)


Powering Faceted Bar Charts
---------------------------


The faceted bar chart requires a Category, a Value and a Series.


For information about value, category, and series data, see [Understanding Chart Data](..\understanding_chart_data\index.md).


In the Analyzer, you choose the columns containing the data for your faceted bar chart. For more information about choosing data columns, see [Applying DataSet Columns to Your Chart](..\applying_dataset_columns_to_your_chart\index.md).


For more information about formatting charts in the Analyzer, see [Visualization Card Building Part 2: The Analyzer](..\..\category\analyzer\index.md).
